name: BuildMachine-steps

on:
  push:
    branches: [ dev ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ dev ]

jobs:
  NET-BuildMachine:
    name: .NET BuildMachine, build, pack and deploy
    env:
      slnPath: "RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption.sln"
      projectFile: "RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption/RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption.csproj"
      nupkgFile: "RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption.*.*.*.*.nupkg"
      nupkgSymbolsFile: "RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption.*.*.*.*.symbols.nupkg"
      id:  "d_var"
      version: "0.0.0.0"
      title: "title_var"
      authors: "authors_var"
      owners: "owners_var"
      description: "description_var"
      
    
    runs-on: windows-latest
    
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v2
    - name: set env id
      run: $env:id = $id 
    - name: set env version
      run: $env:version = $version 
    - name: set env title
      run: $env:title = $title 
    - name: set env authors
      run: $env:authors = $authors 
    - name: set env owners
      run: $env:owners = $owners 
    - name: set env description
      run: $env:description = $description 

## Python
    
    - name: setup python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v2
      with:
            python-version: 3.8
    - name: download script
      run: curl.exe --output move_env.py --url https://raw.githubusercontent.com/benjamindev-ops/auxiliar/main/move_env.py
            
    - name: execute py change env 
      run: python3 -c "import move_env; print(move_env.change_name('RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption.nuspec'))"
      
    - name: validate path
      run: dir
 
    - name: Display the file content
      run: |
        import os
        nuspec_raw = os.popen("cat RelayHealth.EncryptionDecryption.nuspec").read()
        print(nuspec_raw)
      shell: python

## .NET

    - name: Setup .NET
      uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v1
      with:
        dotnet-version: 6.0.x    

      
    - name: Add nuget.org as nuget package source
      run: dotnet nuget remove source nuget.org && dotnet nuget add source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json --name nuget.org

    - name: Restore dependencies
      run: nuget restore  ${{ env.slnPath }}

    - name: Add msbuild to PATH
      uses: microsoft/setup-msbuild@v1.1

    - name: Build app for release
      run: msbuild ${{ env.slnPath }} -verbosity:minimal -property:Configuration=Release -property:Platform="Any CPU" -clp:ErrorsOnly
     
    
    - name: Nuget package
      run: nuget pack -IncludeReferencedProjects -Prop Configuration=Release -Symbols
      
        
    - name: PushNuget
      run: dotnet nuget push *.nupkg --source https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json --api-key ${{secrets.PUBLISH_TO_NUGET_ORG}} --skip-duplicate
